rooms.name: Forgotten Chamber
rooms.description: A damp and eerie chamber filled with ancient carvings on the walls. The air smells of dust and decay.

item.name: Rusty Sword
item.description: An old, rust-covered sword. Not very sharp, but better than nothing.

rooms.name: Hall of Whispers
rooms.description: Faint whispers echo in the darkness. The stone floor is covered in dried blood.

item.name: Leather Armor
item.description: Basic armor made from toughened leather. Offers some protection.

enemies.name: Shadow Stalker
enemies.description: A dark figure that moves between the shadows, striking when least expected.

rooms.name: The Cursed Armory
rooms.description: Rusting weapons and shattered shields litter the floor, remnants of past battles.

item.name: Steel Dagger
item.description: A lightweight dagger with a sharp edge, ideal for quick attacks.

enemies.name: Possessed Knight
enemies.description: A fallen warrior whose soul is bound to his rusted armor.

rooms.name: Chamber of Echoes
rooms.description: Every sound is amplified a hundredfold. You can hear your own heartbeat.

item.name: Chainmail Vest
item.description: A sturdy vest made of interlocking steel rings, offering solid protection.

enemies.name: Phantom Warden
enemies.description: An ethereal guardian bound to the chamber for eternity.

rooms.name: The Black Forge
rooms.description: A long-forgotten forge where legendary weapons were once crafted. The air is thick with heat and the scent of molten metal.

item.name: Flameforged Greatsword
item.description: A massive sword, its blade still glowing faintly from the forge.

enemies.name: Infernal Guardian
enemies.description: A fiery elemental bound to the forge, protecting its ancient secrets.

enemies.name: Lava Wraith
enemies.description: A spirit formed from molten rock, its touch sears the flesh.

rooms.name: Throne of the Fallen King
rooms.description: A vast, dark chamber with an imposing throne at its center. The air crackles with raw energy.

enemies.name: King's Shadow
enemies.description: A phantom of the king, mirroring his every move in battle.

loot.name: Shadow's Amulet
loot.description: An eerie amulet radiating dark energy. Wearing it feels like stepping into the king's shadow, unseen yet ever-present.

enemies.name: The Fallen King
enemies.description: A tyrant long dead, yet refusing to leave the world of the living. His power is unmatched.

loot.name: Crown of the Fallen King
loot.description: A cursed crown radiating dark energy.

rooms.name: Sunlit Exit
rooms.description: A blinding light floods the passage ahead. You take a deep breath and step forward, leaving the darkness behind.
